name: War Maze
description:
War Maze is turn-based strategy game based on chess!



War Maze matches are played on a map of tiles, similar to chess. Each piece has different tile-based movement and attack patterns. Each piece also has a certain amount of attack and health points.



Beat your way through the campaign to get a sense of each piece's mechanics and unlock skins!


Buy and select skins to form your own army to fight with in multiplayer mode!
